device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
use_cases_desc: Transferring data and/or interfaces between devices.
evaluation: User study (qualitative); User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment)
contribution_desc: Explores how the combination of personal devices and a simple way of exchanging information between these devices and an interactive surface changes the way people solve collaborative tasks compared to an existing approach of using personal devices
tracking_characteristic: Outside-in tracking; Location 2D on surface; Location 2D
